translation:
Piratini, October 18, 1838.

Most Illustrious Sir,

The government commands that Your Lordship, São João, citizen Manuel da Silva Pacheco, ascertain whether the effects seized on the schooner “Mineira” are at Passo do Mendonça or in the warehouses of D. Antônia, at Barra de Camaquã, so that the carts sent from here to transport such effects may go directly to the place of receiving the cargo; and this can be done promptly by Your Lordship Francisco Antônio Machado, who today departs from here with carts for the conveyance of the aforementioned effects.

God preserve Your Lordship,

Domingos José de Almeida
